channel.title: Changing Wild Area Into a Safe Spot?
channel.description:
[b]The Main question is in bold.[/b]
I am the owner of the server "Sn0wbreeze" that used to be on the front page of Rswebclients.com's server list. 6th-8th place. Now the server was going nowhere and I got lazy on coding because it was pointless to continue coding for a dead server. The source I was using was too broken and so I got a better lower revision of a server that's fully functional. Now I'm making Sn0wbreeze V2 with a client and [b]I need help to figure out how to make a part of the Wilderness a safe spot?[/b] The original source had it has a safe spot already. The trees and banks are there in the home already.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/23r39co.jpg[/img]
P.S. I did not intentionally mean to make this a huge paragraph. Sorry.

item.title: Changing Wild Area Into a Safe Spot?
item.dc:creator: @OwnerGriffin OwnerGriffin
item.description:
@OwnerGriffin wrote:

The Main question is in bold.

I am the owner of the server “Sn0wbreeze” that used to be on the front page of Rswebclients.com’s server list. 6th-8th place. Now the server was going nowhere and I got lazy on coding because it was pointless to continue coding for a dead server. The source I was using was too broken and so I got a better lower revision of a server that’s fully functional. Now I’m making Sn0wbreeze V2 with a client and I need help to figure out how to make a part of the Wilderness a safe spot? The original source had it has a safe spot already. The trees and banks are there in the home already.
